abstract: A visit to Lower Manhattan would now not be complete for some tourists without seeing the Occupy Wall Street encampment.
snippet: A visit to Lower Manhattan would now not be complete for some tourists without seeing the Occupy Wall Street encampment.
lead_paragraph: The first stop on Sharon Wheeler's trip to New York City last weekend was Kleinfeld Bridal, the wedding dress emporium, where her niece, Morgan Vaught, tried on gowns.

headline.main: For Some, Zuccotti Park Becomes a Must-See Attraction
